verses.roman:
ei-mata vipra citte cintite lāgila
āra dina laghu-vipra tāṅra ghare āila

synonyms: ei-mata—in this way; vipra—the elderly brāhmaṇa; citte—within the mind; cintite—to think; lāgila—began; āra dina—the next day; laghu-vipra—the young brāhmaṇa; tāṅra—his; ghare—to the home; āila—came.
translation: The next day, the elderly brāhmaṇa was thinking deeply about this matter when the young brāhmaṇa came to his house.
